title: Show role on game accept.
body: When you accept or decline a game on draft pick, you do not see what role you'll get. Wouldn't it be better if you see what role you are about to get before you accept a game. This way you always get the role you want.

replies.body:
Player:  Hmm, I've been autofilled.
Player: _Decline queue_
Player: _Requeue_

That defeats the entire purpose of autofill and would completely screw queue times.

I feel they should screw people who would try that, Guarantee they don't get their pref role, get into all the statistics and force the role they never want to play, until they learn not to do it.

I'd make some popcorn and watch someone the entire time
That would defeat the purpose of auto-filling and keeping queues shorter
